segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism,
and they criticize those deserving of praise.

segments.pli: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
segments.en: Without examining or scrutinizing, they arouse faith in things that are dubious,

segments.pli: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
segments.en: and they don’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
And they waste a gift given in faith.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism,
and they praise those deserving of praise.

segments.pli: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
segments.en: They don’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,

segments.pli: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
segments.en: and they do arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
